description: [![Discord](https://img.shields.io/badge/Chat-Discord-blue.svg)](https://discord.gg/JQeVxbQT5G) # AFKBot A bot for Minecraft to stay AFK thanks to [mineflayer](https://github.com/PrismarineJS/mineflayer). Mainly for Windows, but works also on macOS and Linux.
